treatment-md.title: Brachyhypopomus (Odontohypopomus) Sullivan, Zuanon & Fernandes, 2013, subgen. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Two new species and a new subgenus of toothed Brachyhypopomus electric knifefishes (Gymnotiformes, Hypopomidae) from the central Amazon and considerations pertaining to the evolution of a monophasic electric organ discharge
